overview: Michael Weintraub is President and CEO of Humedica. Prior to launching Humedica, Michael served as Senior Managing Director at Leerink Swann, a leading health care investment bank. Previously, he was President and CEO of PHARMetrics, a health care informatics company, which was successfully sold to IMS Health in 2005. Michael has more than 25 years of executive management experience in the health care technology, information services, and consulting arenas. Michael serves as Chairman of the Board of Phreesia, a software company that develops automated patient check-in tools, and sits on the board of Anceta, the medical informatics subsidiary of the American Medical Group Association (AMGA). Michael received his MBA from Harvard Business School and his bachelorâ€™s degree in Economics from Brandeis University.
